text: Kubera ibyo, twategetse bene Isiraheli ko uzica umuntu atamuhoye ko yishe undi cyangwa ko yakoze ubwononnyi ku isi, azafatwa nk’uwishe ab’isi bose. N’uzarokora ubuzima bw’umuntu, azagororerwa nk’uwarokoye ab’isi bose. Kandi rwose intumwa zacu zabazaniye ibimenyetso bigaragara, ariko abenshi muri bo nyuma yabyo bakomeje kuba abangizi ku isi
